meanings.definition: A place where young children are cared for during the day while their parents are at work.
meanings.sent1: Many parents drop off their kids at daycares before going to work.
meanings.sent2: She works at one of the local daycares, looking after toddlers.
meanings.sent3: The daycares in our town always have colorful toys for the children to play with.
meanings.sent4: The daycares acted as safe havens for the little ones during the busy workday.
meanings.sent5: Visiting the daycares brought back memories of my own childhood.

meanings.definition: The act of providing care for young children during the day.
meanings.sent1: Her passion for daycares stemmed from her love for children.
meanings.sent2: Daycares play a crucial role in supporting working parents.
meanings.sent3: The comedy skit humorously portrayed the challenges of running multiple daycares.
meanings.sent4: In her heart, she believed that daycares were the foundation of a strong community.
meanings.sent5: The dedication of the staff at the daycares was truly admirable.
